name: Hidden Menace
description:
When the fun gets out of hand you have to find hidden objects!

Features:-
- Fun hidden object game
- 15 exciting levels of gameplay
- Amazing graphics, layouts, and effects
- Professionally designed and developed game app
- Awesome all-ages game for casual gamers and serious gamers alike

How to play:
- Observing to find unusual objects and places.
- Collect objects by the pictures.
- Use hint to find objects.
- Solve hidden puzzles to get more information
- You can only solve the mystery by finding out all the objects!
